summary: This document is a Power of Attorney form executed by Jeffrey Epstein, appointing Darren Indyke as his agent to manage his accounts with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. It outlines the authority granted to Indyke, including the ability to trade and manage assets on Epstein's behalf. The document also includes legal disclaimers and responsibilities for both the principal and the agent.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein appoints Darren Indyke as his agent to manage his financial accounts.
Both Darren Indyke and Jean Anne Brennan are appointed as agents for Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein executed a Power of Attorney document appointing Darren Indyke as his agent.
The document grants Indyke authority to manage Epstein's accounts with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
Jean Anne Brennan is also mentioned as an agent with notarized signatures.
The correspondence indicates that Epstein transferred over $120 million into his accounts.
The document includes legal disclaimers regarding the responsibilities of the agent.
